text: The 1976 Czechoslovak Figure Skating Championships was held on January 3–4 in Prague. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating, and ice dancing. ==Results== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Rank ! Rank !
